title: How can i add plugins in x64dbg?
content:
I am trying to add 'xAnalyzer' plugin into it but after copying the files, I can't see it in debugger.
Its installation instructions are not working.

comments.text: What have you tried so far? Please elaborate so we can attempt to help without starting from zero.
have you done exactly what they are writing on the github? I've just did it an plugin is visible w/o any problems.

answers_data.content:
Download the files

from
here

All done!

After the steps mentioned by @GameMaster Greatee look under the "Plugins" menu in the main x64dbg window or in the secondary menu in the Disasm window as well for an "xAnalyzer" entry.
Source:https://github.com/ThunderCls/xAnalyzer
